collectAccruedProtocolFee().details: Does not do any token transfer, just reduces the state in wrapper by accruedProtocolFeeLast.     Clearing house already has the amount of settlement tokens to send to treasury.

returns.accruedProtocolFeeLast: amount of protocol fees accrued since last collection.

params.amountSpecified: : The amount of the swap, which implicitly configures the swap as exact input (positive), or exact output (negative)
params.sqrtPriceLimitX96: : The Q64.96 sqrt price limit. If zero for one, the price cannot be less than this value after the swap. If one for zero, the price cannot be greater than this value after the swap.
params.swapVTokenForVQuote: : The direction of the swap, true for vToken to vQuote, false for vQuote to vToken

returns.swapResult: swap return values, which contain the execution details of the swap

updateGlobalFundingState(bool).details: Done when clearing house is paused or unpaused, to prevent funding payments from being received     or paid when clearing house is in paused mode.

AccruedProtocolFeeCollected(uint256).notice: Emitted whenever clearing house enquired about the accrued protocol fees

FundingRateOverrideUpdated(int256).notice: Emitted when funding rate override is updated

LiquidityFeeUpdated(uint24).notice: Emitted when governance updates the liquidity fees

ProtocolFeeUpdated(uint24).notice: Emitted when governance updates the protocol fees

Swap((int256,int256,int256,uint256,uint2.notice: Emitted whenever a swap takes place

collectAccruedProtocolFee().notice: Used by clearing house to know how much protocol fee was collected.

extsload(bytes32).notice: Returns a value from the storage.

swap(bool,int256,uint160).notice: Swap vToken for vQuote, or vQuote for vToken

updateGlobalFundingState(bool).notice: Update the global funding state, from clearing house
